name: ralph-lisa-loop
description: Turn-based dual-agent collaboration with enforced handoff

design.turn_control: Agents must check whose-turn before any action

roles.lisa: Code Reviewer - reviews, provides advisory verdicts

rules.consensus: Both parties must agree before proceeding
rules.verdict: PASS/NEEDS_WORK is advisory, not a command
rules.deadlock: After 5 rounds, use OVERRIDE or HANDOFF
